items.name: Nike Phantom GX 2 Elite - TP-58 (M)
items.description:
Nike Phantom GX 2 Elite TP-58 (White & Gold)

Elegant white base with metallic gold accents for a premium, standout look.

Gripknit upper ensures exceptional control on the ball in all conditions.

Cyclone 360 traction pattern lets you pivot, brake and change direction with confidence.

Asymmetric lacing and low-cut knit collar provide snug, secure fit and comfort.

Designed for elite players who demand precision, agility and style in every play.

Trusted quality backed with a 30-day money-back guarantee.

Secure checkout and one-year manufacturer warranty.

Rated 4.8/5 by those who love high performance with refined aesthetics.

items.name: SF Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite CR7 (M)
items.description:

Azulejo-inspired graphic upper with Vaporposite+ for elite ball control.

Built-in soccer-specific Â¾ Zoom Air unit delivers springy energy return underfoot.

items.name: Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 15 Academy TF (M)
items.description:
Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 15 Academy TF (M)

Upper made with soft synthetic NikeSkin for a close fit and excellent ball touch.

Air Zoom unit in the sole delivers springy, responsive cushioning for sharper accelerations.

Rubber TF outsole with ellipse-style studs gives traction on artificial turf without compromising agility.

Snug, contoured fit with stable heel and speed cage to lock your foot in place.

Built for players who value control, speed, and crisp feel on synthetic surfaces.

Trusted quality backed with a 30-day money-back guarantee.

Secure checkout and one-year manufacturer warranty.

Rated 4.8/5 from users who love its balance of comfort and performance.

items.name: Phantom GX II Elite AG (M)
items.description:
Phantom GX II Elite AG

Revolutionary Gripknit upper on the striking area gives exceptional touch in wet or dry conditions.

Cyclone 360 traction pattern helps with quick cuts, stable pivoting, and agility on artificial grass.

Asymmetric lacing increases surface for ball contact and improves fit across midfoot.

Flyknit collar gives snug, sock-like comfort around the ankle.

Built for control-focused players who demand precision and stability during high-intensity plays.

Trusted quality backed with a 30-day money-back guarantee.

Secure checkout and one-year manufacturer warranty.

Rated 4.9/5 by players who value touch, control, and agility.
